column4: hi i really need help. my screen went blank after i updated my ubuntu lucid i followed the instructions here http://superuser.com/questions/127713/ubuntu-10-04-is-not-booting-and-turns-to-blank-screen-cannot-login. no use. please advise.
i spent 3 days to get ubuntu installed and its vv frustrating to have the display not working the moment i did a update
anyone can help me? i have asked my  question 3 times. and i seem to get no reply.
Xmy screen went blank after i did an update. http://superuser.com/questions/127713/ubuntu-10-04-is-not-booting-and-turns-to-blank-screen-cannot-login i followed instructions here. but didnt help
ah well you back up your pertinent data and then use a Live CD
okie i just installed like 3 days ago.. not much data inside in the first place
jrib: what is the lspci command to see the video card?
it'll list all the card controllers such as wireless and wired ethernet controllers, graphics
jrib: i canot see clearly because as i said the display is nto aligned properly. but from what i can read its VGA controller ATI technolgoies Inc RV350 AQ Radeon 9600
wat is a digital monitor cable?
what do you mean dont worry about it? wat do i do now? how do i pastebin /var/log/xorg.0.log?
hwo do i access /var/log/xorg.0.log? from this terminal i am at?
i am scared to use vi. last time i did that i get a blank screen and i did not know how to exit
